  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2217</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2217</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Bridging the Gap: A World of Countries</string>
            <string language="en">A World of Countries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Welt der Länder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un monde des pays</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um mundo dos países</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un mondo dei paesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κόσμος των χωρών</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat didàctica del material 'Bridging the Gap' en què es desenvolupen les competències comunicatives i es practiquen les habilitats lingüístiques, utilitzant com a tema la descripció de països i continents i dels seus habitants. Accés restringit a usuaris edu365 i xtec.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching unit for the resource "Bridging the Gap" which develops communicative competence and gives practice in linguistic skills for describing countries and continents, and their inhabitants.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació oral</string>
            <string language="en">speech communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Maßeinheit für das Hilfsmittel ",
das den Abstand" überbrückt, welches mitteilsame Kompetenz 
entwickelt und Praxis in den linguistischen Fähigkeiten für das 
Beschreiben der Länder und der Kontinente gibt und ihre Einwohner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité d'enseignement pour la ressource "jetant un
pont sur l'intervalle" ce qui développe la compétence communicative 
et donne la pratique dans des qualifications linguistiques pour 
décrire des pays et des continents, et leurs habitants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando para o recurso "que constrói 
uma ponte sobre a abertura" qual desenvolve o competence communicative
e dá a prática em habilidades lingüísticas para descrever países 
e continentes, e seus habitantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità d'istruzione per la risorsa "che getta un 
ponte sullo spacco" quale sviluppa la competenza comunicativa e dà la
pratica nelle abilità linguistiche per la descrizione i paesi e dei 
continenti e sui loro abitanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα διδασκαλίας για το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς "που 
γεφυρώνει το χάσμα" που αναπτύσσει την επικοινωνιακή ικανότητα 
και δίνει την πρακτική στις γλωσσικές δεξιότητες για την 
περιγραφή των χωρών και των ηπείρων, και τους κατοίκους τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechfunkanlage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission de la parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação de discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">communicazione verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
